body:
And the error locally:

```
bradfitz@laptop http$ go test -v -run=TestCmdGoNoHTTPServer
=== RUN   TestCmdGoNoHTTPServer
--- FAIL: TestCmdGoNoHTTPServer (0.08s)

FAIL
exit status 1
FAIL    net/http        0.126s
```
